title-part.text: POSITIVE-DISPLACEMENT ENGINES DRIVEN BY LIQUIDS

reference.text: positive- displacement engines for liquids and elastic fluids F01; positive- displacement machines for liquids F04; fluid-pressure actuators F15B; fluid gearing F16H

note.note-paragraph: Attention is drawn to the notes preceding class F01, especially as regards the meanings of "positive displacement", "rotary-piston machines", "oscillating-piston machines", "rotary-piston", "co-operating members", "movement of co-operating members", "teeth or tooth-equivalents", and "internal axis".

subnote.note-paragraph:
The following IPC groups are not used in the CPC scheme. Subject matter covered by these groups is classified in the following CPC groups:
F03C1/253 covered by F03C
F03C1/28 " " F03C1/0406, F03C1/0605
F03C1/30 " " F03C1/0409, F03C1/0631, F03C1/0668
F03C1/32 " " F03C1/0415, F03C1/0626, F03C1/0652
F03C1/34 " " F03C1/0435, F03C1/0615, F03C1/0655
F03C1/36 " " F03C1/0435, F03C1/0615, F03C1/0655
F03C1/38 " " F03C1/0435, F03C1/0615, F03C1/0655
F03C1/40 " " F03C1/04N, F03C1/06K

title-part.text: Reciprocating-piston liquid engines

CPC-specific-text.text: the movement in two directions being obtained by two or more double-acting piston liquid motors

title-part.text: with single cylinder, double-acting piston

CPC-specific-text.text: one side of the double-acting piston being always under the influence of the liquid under pressure
the liquid under pressure being continuously delivered to one cylinder chamber through a valve in the piston for actuating the return stroke

title-part.text: with single cylinder, single-acting piston

CPC-specific-text.text: with actuation of the return stroke by gravity

title-part.text: with multiple-cylinders, characterised by the number or arrangement of cylinders

reference.text: with movable cylinders F03C1/22; of flexible-wall type F03C5/02

title-part.text: with movement in two directions being obtained by two single-acting piston liquid engines, each acting in one direction

CPC-specific-text.text: one single-acting piston being always under the influence of the liquid under pressure

title-part.text: with cylinders in star or fan arrangement

CPC-specific-text.text: Details, component parts specially adapted of such engines
consisting of several cylindrical elements e.g. rollers
Arrangements for pressing or connecting the pistons against the actuated cam
Disconnecting the pistons from the actuated cam
Supporting and guiding means for the pistons
Draining of the engine housing; arrangements dealing with leakage fluid
Particularities relating to the distribution members

reference.text: F03C1/0472, F03C1/0531, and F03C1/0538 take precedence

CPC-specific-text.text: by using a valve in a system with several pump or motor chambers, wherein the flow path through the chambers can be changed, e.g. series-parallel
by changing the effective cross sectional piston working surface
by changing the effective piston stroke
by changing the excentricity of one element relative to another element
by changing the phase relationship between two actuated cams
by changing the phase relationship between the actuated cam and the distributing means

title-part.text: the pistons co-operating with an actuated element at the outer ends of the cylinders

CPC-specific-text.text: with two or more radial piston/cylinder units in series
having several cylinder barrels coupled together

title-part.text: the pistons co-operating with an actuated element at the inner ends of the cylinders

CPC-specific-text.text: each piston being provided with channels coacting with the cylinder and being used as a distribution member for another cylinder
with two or more radial piston/cylinder units in series
the piston-driven cams being provided with inlets or outlets

title-part.text: with cylinder axes generally coaxial with, or parallel or inclined to, main shaft axis

CPC-specific-text.text: having two or more sets of cylinders or pistons
Actuated element bearing means or driven axis bearing means
having two or more sets of cylinders or pistons
Particularities in the contacting area between cylinder barrel and valve plate
Swash or actuated plate bearing means or driven axis bearing means
Connection between rotating cylinder and rotating inclined swash plate
Arrangement for pressing the cylinder barrel against the valve plate
using a valve in a system with several motor chambers, wherein the flow path through the chambers can be changed
by changing the inclination of the swash plate
by changing the phase relationship between the actuated element and the distribution means, e.g. turning the valve plate; turning the swash plate
by changing the inclination of the axis of the cylinder barrel in relation to the axis of the actuated element

title-part.text: Distributing valve-gear peculiar thereto

reference.text: for engines with positive-displacement in general F01L

title-part.text: actuated by piston or piston-rod
mechanically
by driving liquid of engine
Speed controlling, equalising or cushioning
specially adapted for engines generating vibration only
with movable cylinders

CPC-specific-text.text: having cylinders in star or fan arrangement, the connection of the pistons with an actuated element being at the inner ends of the cylinders

title-part.text: in which the liquid exclusively displaces one or more pistons reciprocating in rotary cylinders

CPC-specific-text.text: having cylinders in star or fan arrangement, the connection of the pistons with an actuated element being at the outer ends of the cylinders
cylinder block and actuated cam both rotating
with two or more series radial piston-cylinder units
cylinder block and actuated cam both rotating
cylinder block and actuated cam both rotating
having cylinders in star or fan arrangement, the connection of the pistons with an actuated element being at the inner ends of the cylinders
the rotary cylinder being provided with only one piston reci- procating within this cylinder

title-part.text: with cylinders in star- or fan-arrangement,

CPC-specific-text.text: the connection of the pistons with an actuated element being at the outer ends of the cylinders

title-part.text: adapted for special use or combined with apparatus driven thereby

reference.text: aspects predominantly concerning the driven apparatus see the relevant classes for such apparatus

title-part.text: Rotary-piston engines

reference.text: in which the liquid exclusively displaces one or more piston reciprocating in rotary cylinders F03C1/24

note.note-paragraph: Group F03C2/30 takes precedence over groups F03C2/02 to F03C2/24.

title-part.text: of arcuate-engagement type, i.e. with circular translatory movement of co-operating members, each member having the same number of teeth or tooth-equivalents
of intermeshing-engagement type, i.e. with engagement of co- operating members similar to that of toothed gearing

of internal-axis type with equidirectional movement of co-operating members at the points of engagement, or with one of the co-operating members being stationary, the inner member having more teeth or tooth- equivalents than the outer member
of counter-engagement type, i.e. the movement of co-operating members at the points of engagement being in opposite directions

having the characteristics covered by two or more of groups F03C2/02, F03C2/08, F03C2/22, F03C2/24 or having the characteristics covered by one of these groups together with some other type of movement between co-operating members

CPC-specific-text.text: having both the movements defined in sub-groups F03C2/02 and relative reciprocation between members
having both the movements defined in sub-group F03C2/08 or F03C2/22 and relative reciprocation between members
having both the movements defined in sub-groups F03C2/22 and F03C2/24
having the movement defined in F03C2/08 and having a hinged member
